text: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ

translation.en: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative
translation.id: agar Allah menyempurnakan pahalanya kepada mereka dan menambah karunia-Nya. Sungguh, Allah Maha Pengampun, Maha Mensyukuri
